nodes.title: Snapcall for LiveChat - Unlimited voice and video calls right inside the chat

nodes.excerpt: Forget about the CRM systems that include webpage builders, blog engines and 97 other features you don't need. Wobaka is the all-in-one CRM and sales automation tool that makes it easy to manage contacts and automate outreach, without losing your mind.
nodes.title: Wobaka 2.0 - Simple CRM and sales automation for small teams

nodes.excerpt: Signaturely is the eSignature tool for people who want to keep it simple. No complex workflows. No enterprise-level features. We make it easier to get a signature and move on â€” because thatâ€™s all you want. Free for life + 47 templates to get you started.
nodes.title: Signaturely - Free eSignatures for life, free contract templates
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Salespeople spend a lot of time in Zoom and Salesforce. They often take notes in one place and then transpose them, bit by bit, to other places in Salesforce. We made Salesforce available within Zoom, so salespeople don't do double work and save a ton of time.
nodes.title: Bonjour App for Zoom - View and update Salesforce, within Zoom
nodes.author: Etienne Dargnies

nodes.excerpt: PandaDoc for Developers â€” easy and scalable all-in-one API solution for generating documents and capturing eSignatures by embedding them into your app, website, or using the backend API. Explore our fully featured and lifetime sandbox for free.
nodes.title: PandaDoc for Developers - A seamless way to generate documents and collect eSignatures

nodes.excerpt: The Juice is for marketing and sales pros looking for a better way to discover and save the right content for their role. We removed the annoying marketing forms and purely promotional content. Create your profile for relevant, professional content.
nodes.title: The Juice - The content platform for marketing and sales pros
nodes.author: Drew Beechler

nodes.excerpt: 5 minutes before every meeting, 1Page alerts you to start preparing. For each person you are meeting, you get a 1Page customized summary of social insights about the person for conversation starters and their company insights.
nodes.title: 1Page - Conversation starters, insights for every meeting
nodes.author: Pooran Prasad Rajanna

nodes.excerpt: AutoDrive is your Sales assistant whose responsibility is to monitor Gumroad sales of your Google Drive documents and deliver the product to the buyer with view-only permissions. It's a cheaper alternative to https://www.producthunt.com/posts/onlysheets
nodes.title: AutoDrive - Automate access to your Google Drive files sold on Gumroad.
nodes.author: Piyush Santwani

nodes.excerpt: Do you want to sell your product to corporations? Use ICANSELL to create an ideal sales kit & connect with salespersons all over the world without hiring. Pay them only a commission for closed deals.
nodes.title: ICANSELL - Create a sales kit, find salespeople, pay only for the deal
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Call your prospects at the right time, no matter where you are. Use your cell phone to reach out, follow up and stay connected. Try Woodpecker Calls to get closer to your ideal customers.
nodes.title: Woodpecker Calls - Leads in your pocket to schedule & track sales calls
nodes.author: Matt Tarczynski

nodes.excerpt: Nowadays, creators have no control of their fanbase, their earnings & their brands. We empower creators to build their own fan platform, take back control of their fanbase, increase fan engagement, and make more money from their passion.
nodes.title: Fangage 2.0 - Your fans, your platform
nodes.author: Janis Mjartans

nodes.excerpt: KADO helps you to better connect with your clients, exchange business cards, manage contacts, record notes and interactions on prospects to stay on top of your game. Powerful integrations & intuitive UI will help you better manage and convert your prospects
nodes.title: KADO - Digital business card & relationship management solution
